itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss whether or not any of the presidential polls are real, who is actually being polled and why they are skewed, why the 2nd presidential debate got canceled, Bill Burr's opening monologue on SNL this weekend that has people freaking out, and the nude celebrity video telling you how to vote.
